hero.title: Curious minds start here.
hero.subtitle: We bring science, technology, engineering, and math to life for young children through playful, hands-on learning that sparks wonder and builds confidence.

about.title: About EC STEM
about.subtitle: Nurturing tomorrow's innovators through hands-on STEM education
about.description: EC STEM is a leading early childhood STEM education provider, founded by Ms Huang, dedicated to inspiring young minds through innovative learning experiences. We partner with childcare centres to deliver comprehensive STEM programs that develop critical thinking, creativity, and problem-solving skills in children aged 18 months to 6 years.

programs.title: Our STEM Programs
programs.subtitle: Age-appropriate STEM learning experiences designed for every stage of development

toddler.title: Toddler STEM Discovery (18 months - 3 years)
toddler.description: Age-appropriate STEM activities focusing on sensory exploration and basic concepts.

preK.title: Pre-K STEM Adventures (3 - 4 years)
preK.description: Interactive STEM learning through play-based activities and simple experiments.

kindergarten.title: Kindergarten STEM Labs (4 - 6 years)
kindergarten.description: Advanced STEM activities including robotics, coding, and engineering challenges.

services.title: Why Choose EC STEM?
services.subtitle: Comprehensive STEM education that grows with your child

experienced.title: Expert STEM Educators
experienced.description: Our certified instructors specialize in early childhood STEM education

curriculum.title: Research-Based Curriculum
curriculum.description: Programs designed using latest educational research and best practices

development.title: Holistic Development
development.description: Focus on cognitive, social, and emotional growth through STEM activities

partnership.title: Centre Partnerships
partnership.description: Seamless integration with your childcare centre's existing programs

cta.title: Ready to Partner with Us?
cta.subtitle: Join the growing network of childcare centres offering innovative STEM education

aboutPage.title: About Ec stem
aboutPage.subtitle: Singapore's premier provider of early childhood STEM education services, empowering childcare centres with innovative robotics training and comprehensive STEM programs since 2019.

mission.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission.missionText: To transform early childhood education by providing childcare centres with world-class STEM programs, robotics training, and educator development services that inspire young minds and prepare children for a technology-driven future.
mission.visionText: To be the leading STEM education service provider in Southeast Asia, making quality early childhood STEM learning accessible to every childcare centre and nurturing the next generation of innovators, problem-solvers, and critical thinkers.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: These values guide our approach to serving childcare centres and developing STEM programs for young learners.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Bringing cutting-edge STEM education to early childhood learning environments.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Delivering the highest quality STEM programs and professional development.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: Building strong collaborative relationships with childcare centres and educators.

safety.title: Safety
safety.description: Ensuring all programs meet the highest safety standards for young learners.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Making quality STEM education accessible to every childcare centre.

impact.title: Impact
impact.description: Creating meaningful learning experiences that inspire lifelong curiosity.

founder.title: A Message from Our Founder
founder.quote: Every child deserves the opportunity to explore, discover, and fall in love with learning. At EC STEM, we bring the wonder of science, technology, engineering, and mathematics directly to childcare centres, empowering educators and inspiring young minds to see the world as their laboratory.
founder.name: Ms Huang
founder.description: Passionate educator and early childhood STEM specialist

team.title: Meet Our Expert Team
team.subtitle: Our passionate team combines deep expertise in early childhood development with cutting-edge STEM knowledge.

msHuang.name: Ms Huang
msHuang.description: Passionate educator with extensive experience in early childhood STEM education and curriculum development.

jennifer.name: Ms. Jennifer Lim
jennifer.description: Specialist in robotics education for young children with extensive experience in program implementation.

david.name: Mr. David Wong
david.description: Former engineer turned educator, passionate about making technology accessible to young minds.

programmesPage.title: STEM Education Services
programmesPage.subtitle: We partner with childcare centres to deliver innovative STEM education through specialized enrichment programs and hands-on learning experiences designed for young learners.

enrichment.title: STEM Enrichment Programs
enrichment.subtitle: Specialized STEM programs designed to deepen learning and explore advanced concepts.

robotics.title: Robotics & Coding
robotics.description: Introduction to programming concepts and robotic systems through age-appropriate activities.

science.title: Science Experiments
science.description: Hands-on experiments that demonstrate scientific principles and encourage discovery.

engineering.title: Engineering Challenges
engineering.description: Building and design challenges that develop problem-solving and engineering thinking.

math.title: Math Adventures
math.description: Mathematical concepts explored through games, puzzles, and real-world applications.

partnership.title: Partner with EC STEM
partnership.subtitle: We work with childcare centres to integrate STEM education into their existing programs. Our enrichment activities are designed to complement your curriculum and inspire young learners.

scheduling.title: Flexible Scheduling
scheduling.description: Programs designed to fit your centre's timetable and needs

integration.title: Curriculum Integration
integration.description: STEM activities that complement your existing educational programs

support.title: Professional Support
support.description: Ongoing training and support for your educators

about.title: About EC Stem Club
about.description: Leading early childhood STEM education provider, inspiring young minds through innovative learning experiences and partnerships with childcare centres.
